title: Request Flight Itinerary and Receipt
description: A business traveler needs a copy of their flight itinerary and a detailed receipt for an expense report.

tasks.description: Retrieve the traveler's past booking using their name and travel date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the correct past flight booking.

tasks.description: Generate a detailed financial receipt for the booking.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a receipt showing the fare breakdown, taxes, and fees.

tasks.description: Email the itinerary and the receipt to the traveler.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends the requested documents.
